code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var CartListItem=function CartListItem(_ref){var course=_ref.course;var addToSchedule=function addToSchedule(){};var generateSection=function generateSection(section){var secid=section.id;secid=secid.substr(secid.length-3);var times=section.meetings.map(function(meeting){return meeting.day+meeting.start+"-"+meeting.end;});return"Sec "+secid+": "+times.join(", ");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cart-list-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:course.id}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:course.title})]}),course.sections.map(function(section){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cart-list-sections",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:generateSection(section)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:function onClick(){return addToSchedule();},children:" + "})]});})]});};export default CartListItem;
